comoAddnaLista: To add someone into your block list. Go to your matches page, then you will see a button to each person info, click the button to add.
ninguemNaLista: There is no one into your block list.
notificacao: If the player that is in your block list join at your lobby group, you will receive a notification at the top of your screen alerting you.
comoimportar-texto: Click the button and then just load your config file
comoexportar-texto: Click the button and then will be downloaded a config file, then you can share or load at import button.
sons-myinstants-linha-1: * All sounds are being played directly from the website: myinstants.com
sons-myinstants-linha-2: * You can customize using other sounds from there by copying the URL of the "Download MP3" link below the button.
envia-automaticamente-link-lobby-discord: Automatically sends the lobby link with information on the scheduled discord
envia-automaticamente-partida-title: Automatically sends the match with the information on the programmed discord
em-breve-lobby: Soon we will have options for creating a lobby.
em-breve-mapas: Soon we will have automatic map veto options.
entre-no-nosso-discord: Join our discord and ask questions, report bugs, leave a suggestion or feedback.
informe-um-bug: Report a bug or open a request
abra-uma-issue: Open an issue on github explaining in detail your problem / improvement request
estenxao-codigo-aberto: This is an open source extension and any contribution from the community is welcome
veja-quem-sao: See who are the people who are part of this project
mensagemDeEntendi: Warning! You are using the GamersClub Booster extension, which is NOT developed by Gamers Club. We are standalone developers, and we asking you to report the issues on the extension's own communication channels. Keeping in mind that we developers are also CS:GO players, and we don't always have time to update the extension due to our personal schedules. We count on everyone's understanding, and we hope that the extension can help you to have a better experience.
